image_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, image BLOB: class_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, year TEXT NOT NULL, section TEXT NOT NULL, academicyear TEXT NOT NULL, image_id INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY(image_id) REFERENCES images(image_id)
account_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT NOT NULL, surname TEXT NOT NULL, age INTEGER NOT NULL, image_id INTEGER, FOREIGN KEY(image_id) REFERENCES images(image_id)

professor_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, account_id INTEGER NOT NULL, class_id INTEGER NOT NULL, subject TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(account_id) REFERENCES accounts(account_id), FOREIGN KEY(class_id) REFERENCES classes(class_id)
student_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, account_id INTEGER NOT NULL, class_id INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(account_id) REFERENCES accounts(account_id), FOREIGN KEY(class_id) REFERENCES classes(class_id)

grade_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, professor_id INTEGER NOT NULL, student_id INTEGER NOT NULL, grade TEXT NOT NULL, date TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(professor_id) REFERENCES professors(professor_id), FOREIGN KEY(student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id)

note_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, professor_id INTEGER NOT NULL, student_id INTEGER NOT NULL, date TEXT NOT NULL, content TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(professor_id) REFERENCES professors(professor_id), FOREIGN KEY(student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id)

homework_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY, professor_id INTEGER NOT NULL, class_id INTEGER NOT NULL, content TEXT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(professor_id) REFERENCES professors(professor_id), FOREIGN KEY(class_id) REFERENCES classes(class_id)
